description: figures dressed in black hat and long black cloak, wearing a mask with an old man's face with white hair, beard, and eyebrows, on a brick sidewalk in a city
inscription: verso in purple: Today\'s Jews....October 1980 MAGNUM Distrib. 80-135 / (long text block) / Photos by Leonard Freed/ MAGNUM Photos, 2 rue Christine, Paris 6e. / Photo. 17 (54.2.24/1) during the Festival of Lots \"Purim\" holiday, young children dressing up as old men, Antwerp, Belgium
